yazidi-new-year.tooltip_year: Enter the Gregorian year to calculate Yazidi New Year (Sere Sal)
yazidi-new-year.description: Calculate the date of Yazidi New Year (Sere Sal / Red Wednesday) for any year. Sere Sal falls on the first Wednesday after April 13 according to the Julian calendar.
yazidi-new-year.info_traditions: Sere Sal is celebrated with traditional foods like colored eggs, visits to holy sites, and community gatherings
yazidi-new-year.footer_note: The Yazidi calendar epoch is approximately 4750 BCE. Sere Sal date is calculated based on the Julian calendar.
yazidi-new-year.title: Yazidi New Year Calculator
yazidi-new-year.info_date_calc: Sere Sal (Red Wednesday) is calculated as the first Wednesday on or after April 26 in the Gregorian calendar (Julian April 13)
yazidi-new-year.info_meaning: Sere Sal marks the beginning of spring and the Yazidi New Year, symbolizing renewal and the victory of light over darkness
yazidi-new-year.empty_state: Enter a year to calculate the Yazidi New Year date
